name: Lost Among the Stars (CaraEden)
description:
Forge your own path of brilliant ice to get further than any penguin before!

Made for the Warwick University Game Design Society End of Term Game Jam Winter 2021. The theme was "What do you call a penguin in Africa? Lost!"

Controls
  • Press Up to summon a curving path of ice.
  • Press down to summon a straight path of ice.
